kv18.6:2.3: Yā paṭhamassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, sāva dutiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv18.6:3.1: ☑ Paṭhamā jhānā dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ saṅkamati, na vattabbaṃ—
kv18.6:3.2: “yā paṭhamassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, sāva dutiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhī”ti?
kv18.6:3.4: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ anāvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… appaṇidahantassa uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:3.6: nanu dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… paṇidahantassa uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:3.8: Hañci dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… paṇidahantassa uppajjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv18.6:4.3: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ kāme ādīnavato manasikaroto uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:4.5: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ kāme ādīnavato manasikaroto uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:5.7: Taññeva paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ taṃ dutiyaṃ jhānanti?
kv18.6:6.3: Yā dutiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, sāva tatiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv18.6:7.1: ☑ Dutiyā jhānā tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ saṅkamati, na vattabbaṃ—
kv18.6:7.2: “yā dutiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, sāva tatiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhī”ti?
kv18.6:7.4: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ anāvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… appaṇidahantassa uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:7.6: nanu tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… paṇidahantassa uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:7.8: Hañci tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… paṇidahantassa uppajjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv18.6:8.3: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ vitakkavicāre ādīnavato manasikaroto uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:8.5: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ vitakkavicāre ādīnavato manasikaroto uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:9.7: Taññeva dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ taṃ tatiyaṃ jhānanti?
kv18.6:10.3: Yā tatiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, sāva catutthassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv18.6:11.1: ☑ Tatiyā jhānā catutthaṃ jhānaṃ saṅkamati, na vattabbaṃ—
kv18.6:11.2: “yā tatiyassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhi, sāva catutthassa jhānassa uppādāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhī”ti?
kv18.6:11.4: Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ anāvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… appaṇidahantassa uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:11.6: nanu catutthaṃ jhānaṃ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… paṇidahantassa uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:11.8: Hañci catutthaṃ jhānaṃ āvaṭṭentassa uppajjati …pe… paṇidahantassa uppajjati, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv18.6:12.3: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ pītiṃ ādīnavato manasikaroto uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:12.5: Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ pītiṃ ādīnavato manasikaroto uppajjatīti?
kv18.6:13.7: Taññeva tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ taṃ catutthaṃ jhānanti?
